response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Given its importance and rarity, I understand that the price might be a deciding factor for you. Therefore, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product for $950,000.

Considering its worth to you is $800,000, this offer presents a favorable opportunity for both parties. It not only aligns closely with its perceived value but also secures a substantial profit for me. I am confident that this product will bring immense value to your endeavors.

Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
